entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High 6. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
